lines.text: Hey, spinach chin, do you mean to tell me that you're only a doorman?

[tearfully]
Yes!
Well, there's the door, man.

[after nearly bumping into Moe and Larry]
Boy, if I hadn't ducked, we would have collided sure. What a narrow escape.
[stands up and knocks over the dishes being held above him]

[to Hassen Ben Soba and Ginna Rumma]
What'll you have?
We want...

[cutting him off]
We don't have any more.
All we got left are rabbit and hot dogs.
Rabbit.
Hot dogs.
Hot dog, they'll take rabbit.

[to Shemp, getting up and pointing to his chair]
Sit down!
Oh, but I'm not tired, I'll just stand while you eat.

[pulls out his dagger]
Sit down with your hands on or off!
Y-you talked us into it.
Hark! Who goes there?
Santa Claus!
Ah, there ain't no Santa Claus.

[as all three of them get out and open their bag]
Oh, yes, there is, and we've got a present for you.
You have?
Yeah, right here!
[hits the guard over the head and he falls into the bag unconscious]
I am Hassan Ben Soba.
I had a few too many myself.
[chuckles]
Quiet!
[throws a handful of spaghetti in Shemp's face]
There's only one 100-carat diamond, and it comes from Rootin Tootin's Tomb.
That's government property.
Right, and if we return it, we'll get a big reward.
Yeah! Maybe fifty-thousand bucks. Boy, with that kind of money, we could rent a one-room apartment in Hollywood... maybe.

[giving turban to guard who has just been hit with fruit]
Your hat.
Thank you.
You're welcome.

[realizes what just happened]
Why you-!
[is cut off as Moe gets scared before dropping a vase on his his head]

[after Hassan, Ginna, Moe, and Shemp think he's killed a dog and a cat, he comes out to serve the food]
Here you are, gentlemen. Hot dogs, when it comes to cookin' are the cat's meow.
